AutoVariable.label: Only reflect when able
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't try to reflect when using primary fire.

AutoVariable.label: Teammate projectiles
AutoVariable.tooltip: Attempt to reflect teammate projectiles.

AutoVariable.label: Teammates
AutoVariable.tooltip: Auto extinguish teammates.

AutoVariable.label: Dodgeball mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: Disables vischeck.

AutoVariable.label: Legit mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't move the mouse to reflect. Spectator safe.

AutoVariable.label: Healing bolts
AutoVariable.tooltip: Crusader's Crossbow healing bolts.

AutoVariable.label: Cleavers
AutoVariable.tooltip: The Scout's Flying Guillotine.

AutoVariable.label: Default
AutoVariable.tooltip: If a projectile is not known, should autoreflect still try to reflect it?

AutoVariable.label: Decrease stab range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Decreases the swing range in order to make backstabs more consistent. Recommended while using backtrack.

LabeledObject.label: Trigger key mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: Optional: what should the key set below do?

AutoVariable.label: Wait for charge
AutoVariable.tooltip: Hold fire until a single shot is enough to kill the target.

AutoVariable.label: Zoomed only
AutoVariable.tooltip: When applicable, only fire when zoomed.

AutoVariable.label: Accuracy mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: Shrinks the target's effective hitbox. Makes the triggerbot more accurate, but fire less frequently.

AutoVariable.label: Delay
AutoVariable.tooltip: Triggerbot's delay in milliseconds.

AutoVariable.label: Max range
AutoVariable.tooltip: Entities further than this distance will be ignored. Measured in Hammer units.

AutoVariable.label: Teammates
AutoVariable.tooltip: Fire on teammates.

AutoVariable.label: Stickybombs
AutoVariable.tooltip: Fire upon stickybombs.

AutoVariable.label: Enable auto Detonator
AutoVariable.tooltip: Auto explode Detonator flares.

AutoVariable.label: Enable auto sticky
AutoVariable.tooltip: Auto detonate stickies.

LabeledObject.label: Legit mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: Rage: No changes to make the autosticky appear more legit. Semi-legit: Require a line of sight to the Sticky and ignores invisible spies. Legit: same as semi-legit but also require a line of sight to the enemy.

AutoVariable.label: Don't blow me up
AutoVariable.tooltip: Don't detonate if you would recieve damage.

AutoVariable.label: Min distance
AutoVariable.tooltip: Stickies will be auto-detonated if enemies are within this distance (measured in Hammer units).

AutoVariable.label: Enable auto Dead Ringer
AutoVariable.tooltip: Auto activate the Dead Ringer if equipped.
